website_summaries.verdict: A versatile cream dispenser capable of use in desserts, baked goods, breakfast pastries, etc.
pros: Lightweight design is ergonomically shaped to keep the hands comfortable while squeezing the trigger for long periods of time
Plastic head is washable and replaceable
cons: Instructions can be difficult to understand when first learning to use the cream dispenser

customer_reviews.title: Metal Cap is a Must for these!
customer_reviews.text: This cream whipper has worked perfectly, and has excellent construction. There are others with similar design where the cap with the threads are made of plastic. There have been cases where these cause great injury to people if the plastic cap breaks while under full pressure. This one has a full metal construction in the cap threads so we tossed out the old plastic one we had. No issues since we bought this months ago, other than now we have a much higher grocery bill with all the organic cream we have to source ;-)
customer_reviews.author: JJ218

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Keto
customer_reviews.text: Keto desserts have many recipes with whip cream, this is the perfect way to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Creamy & Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy berries w/ whipped cream for dessert. We had been purchasing cans at the grocery store and thought this might be a healthier more economical way to consume our favorite topping. The canister comes with detailed instructions which made it super easy to prepare. I just add heavy whipping cream and stevia and it comes out perfect. You do have to refrigerate the canister for several hours before use, and purchase the cartridges separately. The canister also comes with a few different dispenser tips, a cleaning brush and an extra gasket/seal.
customer_reviews.author: ACNEL

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful replacement for those store bought whipping cream cans
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful replacement for those store bought whipping cream cans. As a diabetic, I can sweeten the cream with splenda and get no rise in blood sugar. It also makes a real fun way to spoil my grand kids. I tell them to open up and squirt this in their mouth and they love it! Several different recipes (I still have yet to try) can be used. This a very well built product that should last for years, and judging from how much volume you get from a small amount of cream I'm sure it will pay for itself by the end of this holiday season. It's a guilty pleasure for sure but I just love kitchen gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean. You know what’s in your whipped cream instead of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy little gadget. I bought this because I don’t eat sugar and don’t eat the extra ingredients that are often put in processed foods. I hated making homemade whipped cream using beaters because you can over mix and it takes forever to get to whipping cream. With this little gadget I can make my own unsweetened whipped cream easy peas and it can last in your fridge for a while. ! I love it! Plus it has different caps for different patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to My Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love this whipped cream dispenser. It is easy to assemble, made of quality materials and produces wonderful results. It is so much easier than whipping cream in my food processor and putting in a pastry bag. I used it to top desserts and eggnog cocktails on Christmas Eve and it worked perfectly. Superior customer service. I had a few questions and they were promptly answered. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lareau

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great seller! Great whipped cream!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great seller! Ross was super helpful and very responsive to a customer service issue. He got back to me right away and followed-up to make sure everything got resolved and that I was pleased. The whipped cream maker itself is easy to assemble, easy to use, and makes DELICIOUS whipped cream. Being someone who has made whipped cream with an electric beater for years, and who loves to entertain and make desserts, this is such an amazing gadget to add to my kitchen. I opted for one with plastic nozzles hearing that some of the metal ones left a funny taste. The plastic worked well, feels sturdy enough, and the taste is unaffected.
customer_reviews.author: yogi

customer_reviews.title: Attention BASSHEADS
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have high expectations for this, 37 dollars. How well does it work?? How long will it last?? Does it do what I need it to do? Is it as good as the mafia??? Just buy. Seriously. Best 37$ spent lately. Comes already ready to go. Get some slaps, slap her up and enjoy! I’m sure it’s great for whipped cream too.
customer_reviews.author: Kallista

customer_reviews.title: An excellent creamy journey
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You can load up two cartridges at once. A tank would be better, but this is great. You start with two, let a big one out to free up room, quickly put another in, then you can take much bigger one & go to cream land. Excellent with Molly & other fun edibles.
customer_reviews.author: Gigglingrizz

customer_reviews.title: Scarey
customer_reviews.text: I set it up all went well however it stopped working then I tried to open it to see what was wrong I couldn’t get it opened so I had my housekeeper to try she said the cream exploded and the top went flying she said she was lucky she didn’t get hurt, I used one from William Salona for 10 years and it finally wore out but never anything like this I’m going to send it back for all the reasons I mentioned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely works after a couple days...
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after a couple of days. It won’t pierce the cartridge wel and now just slowly leaks it into canister. I tried cleaning it but it seems to be a manufacturing problem or quality control issue. I liked it when it worked properly....
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is our first time to try a product like this and it has worked even better than I thought. It is a quality, professional-looking item that is very easy to use. We purchased this to make the specialty coffee drinks that call for whipped cream. I'm amazed as how much better this whipped cream tastes than from the purchased aerosol cans. In addition this cream is free from all the additives in the ready made store whipped cream - a definite plus. We hope to try the mousse and experiment with other uses from this fun-to-use. item.
customer_reviews.author: DianeCB

customer_reviews.title: included extra gasket and N2O holder
customer_reviews.text: Have bought a couple of different whipped cream dispensers over the years... the two major points of failure are the head gasket (can wear over time) and the N2O cartridge holder (plastic part can be mis-threaded). I was pleasantly surprised when an extra gasket and cartridge holder were included with accessories! The seller obviously stands by the guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Kev Pix

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of crap and will waste 1/3rd of your cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and easy to care for
customer_reviews.text: I hosted a coffee party shortly after receiving this handy little device and it was a huge hit! 3 different flavors of whipped cream for 5 different varieties of coffee. Easy to clean and easy to care for, would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! We love it! So easy to use and amazing results! Best espresso whipped cream!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Perry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Made the famous Monkeypod Maitai this weekend with the Lilikoi foam. It was a thing of beauty. Based on the volume this dispenser holds, I was able to get 6 servings of foam for the cocktails per batch. I have seen some recipes call for 2 chargers to be used for very stiff foam, but was not sure if that would be safe?
customer_reviews.author: RMcGill

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made, Durable, and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great cracker. Holds two chargers nicely - anymore than that and you might be jeopardizing the seals. Word to the wise - adjust the dispenser tip that screws up and down before using it. Mine came completely loosened and there was too much play in the trigger before the nitrous would begin to dispense. Adjusting this down stopped the annoying clicking and made for nice, smooth dispensing, even with a full 2 chargers in the cracker. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Impact

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love whipped cream, and this is a dream come true. Some things I've learned while using this: 1. You can load the bottle and keep it in the fridge for a week and it doesn't spoil. Not something you can do when whipping it all in a bowl. 2. Make sure the spray nozzle is somewhat tight, or it will not come out whipped. 3. Only unscrew while pressurized if you want whipped cream all over the place 4. Sometimes I had to use 2 cartridges to get enough pressure to whip.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: FROSTBITE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible was dented already when I recieved it and gabe my hand frostbite
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wong

customer_reviews.title: No complaints whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 8 months and have used it daily for our morning lattes. It's very sturdy and works great. I do have to use 2 chargers, but I could probably avoid that problem by adding a bit more cream, or maybe even shake it more than it says on the directions. I really don't have any complaints. It's such a nice little luxury to add this to our coffee in the morning. Between this dispenser and the DeLonghi cappuccino maker, we've cut Starbucks and coffee house visits way down.
customer_reviews.author: WhippetMom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the Holidays for family members to put on desserts and I was really hesitant about getting it at first, I thought it would be difficult to make the whipped cream. Not at all! You will not buy store bought whipped cream again.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Rushin Jr

customer_reviews.title: This dispenser doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this whipped cream dispenser, then exchanged it for the identical model when the nozzle to which you attach the white plastic dispenser broke. But the replacement, while not broken, does not work well, either. I had an ISI whipped cream dispenser for years, and it was fabulous. This one purports to be the same technology, but it usually won't even dispense without using two gas canisters, and it loses its dispensing ability after the first couple of uses. Last night I could get nothing more out of the dispenser, and when I opened it, it was practically full. It's a great price, but a rotten product. I will find the ISI model and re-purchase that, whatever the cost.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very important to keep well chilled and well pressured.
customer_reviews.text: I find this whipped cream dispenser an absolute wonder! Add two cups of heavy cream, four tablespoonfuls of powdered sugar, a teaspoon of vanilla and a tablespoon of pure maple syrup into a very cold dispenser reservoir. Screw on the top, screw in the cartridge, give a vigorous shake (about 9 or 10) and dispense a very nice whipped cream, superior in both taste and texture. When about half used repressor with another cartridge and continue to have an excellent topping.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cartridge holder not metal.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great before the cartridge holder stripped. Once the second cartridge holder strips out I will be buying one from another company. You really should specify in the description that the cartridge holder is not metal. I would not have purchaced your product knowing that.
customer_reviews.author: Kyl3wyld

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gadget for a kitchen nerd (like me)
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I am a fan of making everything from scratch at home and I got tired of whipping each serving of cream by hand for a coffee here, a dessert there, etc. I am keto/low carb and I now make coffee shop style drinks at home with no sugar or processed junk, so I love adding plain heavy cream to this whipper and having it ready to add a quick fluffy top to my coffee or my sugar free homemade gelatin desserts, cheesecake, mousse, etc. It's easy to fill, assemble, charge, use, and clean. No complaints whatsoever. Thanks for a fantastic product. I have been delighted with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: bwoodzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price point. Don’t hesitate to buy this Eurkitchen product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, high quality look and feel, works as expected. Followed the instructions in pre-cooling etc. and made absolutely perfect whipped cream my first try. I Also purchased N2O cylinders for whipping cream and other cream based recipes and N2 cylinders for infusion of nitrogen not coffee. Both worked flawlessly. Very easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this product. Eurkitchen is great to work with and I would recommend them as well. I did receive a few additional recipes when registering my dispenser. My only wish is for more creative recipes to really explore this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Life changing utility
customer_reviews.text: My husband gifted me this as one of my bday presents and it has been a charm since then and saves us money from starbucks and anytime ready to drink coffee with nitro is what you can be pleased with. I also appreciate the great customer support the owners have and personal interest they take in for each feedback. I have referred to my friends and hoping they like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun tradition to adopt! Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend that grew up having on of these and it is her family tradition! I knew them my kids would love to adopt the tradition so as I was searching and reading reviews, this one seemed to be great! We love it! We had trouble getting the n2o to puncture so I put a paper towel behind it in the casing and it worked perfectly! I’m new to this so maybe I need to look for bigger n2o’s! Other than that— it is superb! Has a couple whipped creme recipes and we love using this on pancakes and hot chocolate- and just spraying in our mouths (of course). Such a fun product!
customer_reviews.author: Always a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. It makes GREAT whipped cream and the company is so easy to work with. I was having trouble at first getting whipped cream that would hold its shape. I contacted the company and they responded right away with some great tips (be sure to shake it vigorously 8-10 times) and it worked great after that. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lark

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with standard 8g N2O chargers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my mother since she loved the one I got my girlfriend for christmas (not the same brand). It will not puncture standard 8g N2O chargers making it useless. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew DeHart

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN'T PIERCE THE CHARGERS
customer_reviews.text: This sucked. I tried 3 different canisters of gas and it pierced NONE of them. What a waste. I am considering sending it back with cream residue in it just for fun. I used my mixer to whip the 2 cups of cream I used so as not to waste it, but it lasts longer being in the canister. Spend more $ and get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: DMSN1220Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I always was curious about purchasing one of these canisters as I prefer to do things as homemade and fresh as possible. This canister is extremely well made. I love the heavy duty feel of it. It is really easy to use. At first I was nervous with playing with a capsule of nitrous oxide, but it is really easy to screw the capsule on. Just remember that it has to be totally discharged before dissembling to clean. I love the fact I can make my own whipped cream toppings and play around with the flavors. A great buy for those of you who love to be imaginative and have fun with your food!
customer_reviews.author: Cayorda

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this ages ago?
customer_reviews.text: Why I didn’t buy this ages ago?! I am a huge whipped cream fan. I don’t think coffee but sure love chocolate frappe with big pile on whipped cream on top. Now with this whipped cream dispenser, I can make my own chocolate frappe and a lot of whipped cream on top anytime at home. The dispenser is easy to use and simple to clean. I just the whip cream in there, give it a little shakes and I’m ready to make a big pile of whipped cream. I personally think this whipped cream dispenser is good quality. Not too expensive for the performance it does. Ever since I got it, it has been working great so far. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm, whipped cream
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS SO COOL. I've been wanting one of these bad boys for a long time, and finally spoiled myself. It looks confusing at first if you've never used one, but the instructions are easy to follow, it works perfectly, and I've been putting whipped cream on almost everything since. I'm only mad I didn't buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about 4 different whipped cream dispensers. This one is hands down the best of them. The cheaper ones are just that - cheap quality that usually end up leaking nitrous after a few uses. This one has been used heavily and hasn't leaked at all. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VWHITMORE

customer_reviews.title: Great product - you have to twist the top on very fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the whipped cream is amazing. We've only used it for whipped cream and since we start with fresh cream, we know what, exactly, is in the final product (a hint of vanilla and stevia). No sugar or chemicals to interfere with the flavor! You do need strong grip. It can be hard to get the cylinder on tight and remove it, if you get it too tight. If you don't tighten the charger very quickly, you will lose some of the charge and have less for dispensing the whipped cream. It sure does beat having to stand there with a hand mixer and whip cream for dessert - it's fast, easy and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Di_anna

customer_reviews.title: Blows-Out 1 out of 5 Chargers
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spend a lot of money on extra N2O chargers to replace the 1-in-5 that this whipped cream dispenser will waste due to blowouts, then buy this one. I had my last whipped cream dispenser for 10 years and only lost one or two N2O cartridges to blowouts before I finally replaced it due to a failing seal. So, I expected better results!
customer_reviews.author: LadyGroundscore

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream at the ready!  :)
customer_reviews.text: I just love this whipped cream dispenser! I've never had one before and always beat my heavy whipping cream with a hand beater before. This is tremendously easy and I love that it is always ready in the refrigerator. I did give this unit 4 stars (instead of five) in Material Quality and Durability for only one reason - there is a threaded stainless steel knob that you put one of 3 plastic spray tips onto (for different whipped designs). The plastic just doesn't thread onto the steel portion very well at all. It does work just fine... but it feels sort of fragile, or like the threads aren't connecting well. But other than that, it's solid as a rock!
customer_reviews.author: SchnoodleGal

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but....
customer_reviews.text: This works well but here’s the problem with it, The inside is coated with some slippery coating which is probably not BPA free. So that is strike one, strike two is that slipperiness makes it difficult to clean the heavy cream... Because it always feels slippery inside and you can’t tell if it’s the fat from the cream or just the inside lining. I’ll be looking for something that’s stainless steel/BPA free 100%
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Belongs in the trash
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, I was trying to make some fresh whipped cream but this thing barely cracks the chargers and nitrous shoots out every where. This thing feels extremely cheap and dangerous. I highly recommend looking for a better product because this one is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Fruits, jello, puddings, pies, pastries....
customer_reviews.text: If those things appeal to you, you really could use the EurKitchen whipped cream dispenser. This is a well made.. simple.. easy to clean machine that has been hanging out in my refrigerator since I began using it about a month and a half ago. This is the first time I've owned one and I'm liking it a lot..!! Thanks EurKitchen for making one of the least expensive whipped creamers such a solid, precision, easy to use, lifetime looking machine...
customer_reviews.author: James T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the store "stuff"
customer_reviews.text: If you want to know what you are eating, get some real heavy cream and this machine - ditch the store "stuff". You can make your own for a fraction of the cost. This product is amazing! The company was super helpful when we started out and struggled to get things right - even e-mailed on July 4 holiday. It ended up that we were forgetting to turn it completely upside down to dispense. Come on you know you want to spray some in your mouth like when you were a kid :).
customer_reviews.author: DAJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Whipped Cream maker so much I bought one for my Mom and one for my daughter-in-law as well! I use it almost every day in my coffee because I love whipped cream, but I don't love all the sugar (my family is prone to diabetes) so I typically use just heavy whipping cream with a little sugar free flavored coffee syrup. I even have to give my two cats a dollop whenever I use it!
customer_reviews.author: A Peace

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: After using around two month, every time getting the charger in is really hard, and the product is stucked forever now! The quality is very bad, won’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: SHANLU XING

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Only problem that I kind of had was the seal around the nozzle. It leaked a little bit but may be because of changing the nozzles around. Once I messed with the seal and got it to close better haven't had an issue really. I will definitely watch the seal and make sure I change, clean, or keep it snug so I hopefully don't have any more issues with it. Other than that very well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t figure out how to load the N2O cartridge so it would puncture. I emailed and got a response within a few hours. The advice was clear and solved the issue. Tighten the holder gently using finger pressure and then firm pressure for last few twists. Best customer service I’ve had on any Amazon purchase (and that is a lot). Product works great. I store in fridge with some plastic wrap over tip. On day 3 and the whip cream is still fluffy and tasty! Just what I wanted. I am not being reimbursed for this review and the review is unsolicited.
customer_reviews.author: bigskygirl50

customer_reviews.title: Rusted - Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times and cleaned per instructions but rusted. It was thoroughly cleaned and dried properly. Unacceptable quality!
customer_reviews.author: MiataZoom

customer_reviews.title: Family says “This is awesome”
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for son and daughter in law the text I received said “ Alright our worlds are changed we whipped up some whip cream and that thing is awesome! “ I know they will get lots of use out of it and don’t think they will by store canned ever again. There are 6 in their household so know 1/2 gallon of heavy cream at Costco will make everyone enjoy it much more often at a much more reasonable cost too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cr54

customer_reviews.title: My son is autistic and has always loved whipped cream from the can - while he won't ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is autistic and has always loved whipped cream from the can - while he won't even look at whipped cream made in a bowl. He thinks this is the best invention ever, and I'm happy to know he's ingesting a lot less sugar and chemicals when he has whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene Franks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well made, it is sturdy and strong, feels like it will function well for a long time. All seals are removable to be cleaned with ease. Seals well and disassembles with minimal effort to clean. If you are looking for a whipped cream can at a low price point, buy this one, it is excellent value but not super cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Waste of money, doesn’t seal well so makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Euphoric
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice, i got super high and couldnt stop. I think i used 100 N20 cartridges the first day, almost passed out too. Very euphoric and easy to inhale.
customer_reviews.author: Laughing gas

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Whipped Cream at Your Fingertips
customer_reviews.text: I love fresh whipped cream but it takes so long to make fresh...until now. This siphon is super simple to operate and makes whipped cream that tastes as good as homemade icecream. My kids love it--I use it on strawberries, hot chocolate, banana pudding, etc. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Robyns Song

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my EurKitchen, only wish I had purchased it a long time ago! Very easy to use and clean. Even though the instructions stated not to shake the dispenser more than 5-7 times, I found that more (shaking) was best. Additionally, every time I took it out of the refrigerator to use, I had to shake it again. Not sure if that is the case for every customer. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L

customer_reviews.title: Best Dispenser! Does Cold Brew and Whipped Cream!
customer_reviews.text: This company has the best service (thanks Mary) and a great product! You can use N20 cartridges for whipped cream and N2 cartridges for cold brew! An incredible value! I was looking at other dispensers over $100 but why? Not only is it highly rated at Amazon — but other “top 10” reviews have this ranked as a “Best Buy” or “best value!” And the customer service is the best I have ever encountered! Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Not for Nitro cold brew!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased this to make the equivalent of Starbucks Nitro cold brew. After further research and after buying this product, I realized that to make the Nitro cold brew, you need N2 tanks not N2O tanks. I haven't used it for whipped cream, but I assume it works fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Coz

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Received as gift from my husband of over 40 years..lol Yes, by now he knows my passion and very high standards regarding any and all of my culinary tools.. This one "Hit the Mark" and did not disappoint. Sleek design, easy to use, quality is excellent. I have already recommended this product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tweedale

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Good quality, value and shopping experience. Shipping and seller follow-through were great. Would recommend. Be careful not to cross-thread the charger holder. (A problem with all designs, not a slam on this one). I only mention it because that's always been a weak point of cream chargers. This one is as good as they get for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DANGEROUS!!! It was an amazing product until the cartridge-puncturing piece blasted off after charging only one cartridge into the dispenser. I'd had and used the dispenser on and off for about a year before this incident happened. It was very dangerous and startling. I was lucky the blast didn't harm me or my dogs. I really enjoyed this product, but the incident was very disturbing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Zugelter

customer_reviews.title: Quality manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made whipped cream dispenser. It’s easy to remove the dispensing tips while the dispenser is full or empty. It even comes with an extra sealing ring.
customer_reviews.author: RMHL

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly! Just Follow Directions
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, cold container, 5-7 shakes and this has been putting out perfection for the past 4 days. Waaaaaay better, faster, and easier then using the blender route. My kids are in heaven. Don't even use any sugar. All you need is a couple tsp of vanilla and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Updated: 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Received with a busted O-ring. I could crank it down and make it work, but not what I expected. I’m sure it was an anomaly though. Would buy from again. Update: Customer service is absolutely amazing. I’m assuming someone from the company read my first review and saw that I was not completely satisfied so I was contacted and sent another. Even without it being a scathing review. New product works great, as I assumed the first was just a one-off issue. I wish I needed more of these just so I could buy from this company again! Highly recommend. Excellent product, excellent customer service. Hope I find a need to use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Not 'all aluminum'
customer_reviews.text: Ordered stainless, got a black one. Advertised as 'all aluminum' but the sleeve for chargers is plastic. Over time that plastic will shred on the aluminum threads and may get tiny bits of plastic in your whip. Not the safest, not the highest quality. Go with a real 100% metal dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Jones

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This product started leaking after 4 uses. I may not have had enough cream in the canister but that shouldn't have been a problem. I continued to try to use it two more times but the last time it completely broke. Disappointed after so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Little

customer_reviews.title: Sugar free, preservative free delicious whipped cream! No more expensive cans!!
customer_reviews.text: This whipping cream dispenser is awesome!!!! I can make sugar free, preservative free delicious whipped cream. No more expensive cans for us! As a diabetic this is so wonderful! It tastes great! It comes with a couple of recipes. When you register your product they give you an e book recipe book too! This is great for Keto lifestyle!! Thank you!!!! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: BettyBeezhold

customer_reviews.title: Fine for casual use, but wears out quickly under pressure
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty well for a while, and I imagine if you're using it casually in the kitchen then it will suit your purposes just fine. But after heavy repeated use, cross threading becomes a major issue. I've noticed some leaking and I can't even open it up to fix it or clean it out. And loading the chargers themselves has become increasingly difficult and rough on my hands. I gave it three stars because it is perfectly suitable for everyday use. But if you need to really put it through its paces it falls short.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Clemensen

customer_reviews.title: Failed within 1.5 months: Not fit for sustained rofessional use
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasted, but unable to sustain performance in a high-volume professional usage setting. I purchased this for restaurant use last month in mid June, to be used for wedding season. After being used heavily for 3 events, it had the unfortunate effect of starting to "explode" from the loosened threads in the middle of the event. Thankfully we had a spare backup canister otherwise the desserts would have been unserviceable. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks out the gas every single time
customer_reviews.text: I have now gone through 15+ chargers(even tried two different brands) trying to figure out what the issue is. I've tried both silicone rings, i've tried flipping them over, twisting them around, pressing them down harder into the top, or less hard. I've tried putting either different attachments on. I've tried screwing and unscrewing it, gentle and firm. NOTHING WORKS. It leaks, immediately after puncture, between the connection of the top, to the main bottle. Sometimes what seems like 20% of the gas escapes, all the way up to 90%. But most of the time it leaks the majority of the gas. So much wasted money!
customer_reviews.author: Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Used once and it's great
customer_reviews.text: EurKitchen Professional Whipped Cream Dispenser was tested out at a party this last week. It worked as expected, cleaned up easily. I used the Creamright Ultra-Purewhip N20 Whipped Cream Chargers. They worked well together and there was no funny taste associated with the charger or canister.
customer_reviews.author: jdmort10

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy Whip Topping! 😋
customer_reviews.text: This is an item I was super excited about! Having a whipped cream dispenser just like the coffee shops! I refuse to buy canned whip topping and I always make my own homemade whipped cream but normally just scoop it from the bowl I blended it in. But with this awesome dispenser I can spray it on coffees, ice cream, and even decorate cakes with it!
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Didn’t even work once for us. The metal threads of the top and the dispenser were slightly askew. We had to oil the threads just to get the top screwed on. Then we couldn’t get a tight enough seal to execute a single whipping. (Not user error, we’ve used whipping dispensers before, it’s not rocket science) What a disappointment! Poor quality - avoid!!
customer_reviews.author: Elebyc

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I love knowing I can make my own whip cream anytime I like. The taste is beyond compare! You need to purchase the N2O cartridge separately. The container is heavy and sturdy. It’s a very quality product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a barista!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my quest to avoid hearing myself utter the dreaded words “Iced vanilla latte with whip please”, as those I am charged five dollars a piece to do so. This canister helps me achieve that goal! It makes ice cold, super-yummy whipped cream which I use to top my homemade lattes with. If you mix 8 pumps of Vanilla Syrup into each pint of whipping cream, it tastes EXACTLY like SB’s. My only complaint is that we go through a LOT of cream these days!
customer_reviews.author: AmyJM333

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I received the whip cream dispenser on Monday but it wasn't until the end of the week that I was able to use it. Pleasantly surprised and very happy with my purchase; to date I've only made regular whip cream but I'm truly excited about the possibilities. All you need to do is follow the instructions included with the device and you'll have top quality whip cream at your disposal. As simply as that. I recommend it without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: CTV

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make whipped cream
customer_reviews.text: After several tries got it. The dispenser nozzle must be kept on when screwing in the cartridge, otherwise the gas leaks out from other end. Just follow the directions carefully. Love it! No other way of making whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann M. Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: This whipped cream dispenser really Whips it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as I normally make my whipped cream by hand but this whipped cream dispenser is amazing. Super easy to use and makes my dessert routine much quicker. Have been putting a little whipped cream on my morning coffee as well. Next I am going to try making nitro cold brew, may need to get another dispenser so I can add some whipped cream on top!
customer_reviews.author: rachel cohen sidley

customer_reviews.title: Double Threat
customer_reviews.text: Made easy whipped cream with a nitrous cartridge. Best to have cold ingredients and let it sit a bit after charging. Very easy. This also makes great sparkling water with CO2 cartridges. Cold water + tonic syrup + gin = homemade summer delight.
customer_reviews.author: ferndave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to infuse N2O into cold brew coffee. It works great for this purpose just so ya know. Going to buy a second one to keep at work for the after lunch pickup. No doubt it works great with cream as well. I may try that some day.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A.

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking
customer_reviews.text: This started slowly leaking about a month after I bought it. It finally got to a point where I couldn't use it anymore. I decided to give this company one more chance so I recently purchased another one. I couldn't even use it once because it leaked so bad. I'm returning it. I wish I could get my money back for the first one.
customer_reviews.author: George E.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one - Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Had the one with plastic, but lost in house move. Worked great, but stepped up to stainless version for new one. Definitely worth the extra cost. the thing has heft. Can;t recommend highly enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it, this thing is amazing. No more whipping! I’ve been baking and making my own whip cream for my whole life and this thing is a game changer. So easy!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product performs as described. The cream has excellent texture and flavor. We have experimented with different amounts of sugar to match taste of foods being served. The left over cream is goo d for up to a week after whipping. Just add more gas to reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this whipped cream dispenser as part of my 'keto kitchen' tools. I am so impressed with this dispenser! The unit is very well made, it chills beautifully, the instructions are quite clear and it is easy to clean. I would highly recommend the EurKitchen Professional Whipped Cream Dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: Gwyneth Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! I add a little whipped cream (without sugar) to my coffee every morning. It keeps well in the fridge and lasts for a long time. Also great for desserts, etc. It's oddly satisfying and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: rad22

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Nitro Coffee
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it, I mistakenly left the cartridge on after charging, so don't do that and you should be fine. It has been working great for coffee. I haven't had a chance to trip whip cream yet, but expect it to work well also.
customer_reviews.author: jmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Works good once you figure it out. We went through a couple of co2 canisters before we mastered it. The only issue I had with it was after a while whipped cream would come out near the co2 canister. Idk why? But there is a lot of assembly, moving parts. It was useful, cool to use. The mousse recipe that came with it was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We were buying so many of the can ones that thought we should buy this item. after ready A LOT of reviews on others this one I chose and glad I did! We really like it .... BUT make sure your tip doesn't go into the garbage disposal and turn it on :( oops good thing there were other tips
customer_reviews.author: Monica Burridge

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties! 😉
customer_reviews.text: As someone who throws a lot of parties, I go through a lot of whip cream chargers (for those who know what I mean). This works perfectly for my needs and at a decent price. Just make sure you don't over twist it, I ended up damaging mine from doing that on accident and air started leaking, so I had to get it replaced. How's that one song go? "I say whip it! Whip it good!" 😉
customer_reviews.author: Ms Foxy

customer_reviews.title: Whip cream maker is another gadget to try
customer_reviews.text: It a very good quality but small only around a pint And you have to buy the N2O cartridges which don’t last long. Beware don’t use C2O if you want it to produce whip cream
customer_reviews.author: budblitz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, works well, just some minor leakage issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy product, the only issue is when charging it with N2O, there seems to be relatively minor, but not insignificant leakage of some of the N2O, which then obviously becomes unusable, wasted gas
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen item is indispensable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my whipped cream maker, as do my grandchildren. It is truly indispensable, especially at holidays. Try adding about 1/2 t. pumpkin pie spice along with the vanilla for topping fall goodies, as pumpkin pie, gingerbread, etc., in coffee too!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Days

customer_reviews.title: Great Whipped Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as you have the correct gasket in place. Seller kindly and promptly sent another gasket that fit perfectl, and reimbursed me for the cost of wasted N02 cartridges. I'm very pleased with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Happyox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whipped cream maker. Holds plenty of heavy cream, easy to use and super easy to clean. I love that it comes with different tips. It’s also high quality
customer_reviews.author: CKCK

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not buy this sooner??
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my restaurant and I couldn't be happier with the performance thus far. I have only had them in operation for one week, but the savings in heavy cream and time have already paid for the units! They seem heavy duty so I would imagine that the whippers will be snappy for quite some time. The only parts that would probably need to be replaced over time would be the seals and it comes with some replacements already. Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, well made!! Whipped cream is sooo much easier in this.. No more whipping!!! I can use stevia!!! Every thing you need to clean the set-up!
customer_reviews.author: Shelltoomuchtoo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and received the product as described. After the first use the product leaked immediately after attempting to use N2O cartridge. After multiple attempts to fix the issue myself, I contact the customer support who were IMMEDIATELY helpful and sent me a replacement overnight for no charge. The new device works as intended, and has performed admirably once or twice a day for the past week I have had it. Thank you for great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: tyler indreboe

customer_reviews.title: This EurKitchen dispenser is great!! When I use it for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1 pint EurKitchen prof. whipped cream dispenser to replace an older model that I inherited. This EurKitchen dispenser is great!! When I use it for entertaining, my guests are amazed-everyone wants to try it out. The product Instructions and suggestions for use are helpful. The dispenser and attachments were packaged very well; couldn't wait to use it when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’m using this for my lattes and the whipped cream tastes awesome and looks pretty good. I need to get used to it since I’ve only used it once so far. The second day I used it it came out a bit runny but then I shook it and that seemed to help. I only used 1 n2o cartridge but I was wondering if I should use 2 for a bit more pressure. I might try that but I don’t want to overfill it. I will inquire with the company.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Whip it Up!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, but when it doesn’t have any pressure left and you open the bottle there is always a great amount of whip cream left in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

product_meta.title: EurKitchen Professional Whipped Cream Dispenser w/Leak-Free Reinforced Aluminum Threads for Max Durability and Safety - 1-Pint Cream Whipper (Black) - Use Standard 8 Gram N2O Chargers (Not Included)
feature_bullets: UPGRADED DESIGN - SERVE CUSTOM-CRAFTED TREATS WITH NO PRESERVATIVES with this 1-pint artisanal cream whipper. Home cooks and professional chefs can top ice cream sundaes, make rich chocolate and savory mousses, gourmet coconut whipped cream, soups, sauces, foams, frothed lattes, flavored seltzers, and nitro coffee. Easily make tasty, zero-carb keto whipped cream by omitting sugar or substituting with natural sugar substitute. You can even make fluffy scrambled eggs and homemade butter!

SAFETY FIRST - DURABLE ALL-ALUMINUM CANISTER AND HEAD with silicone grip and reinforced threads is durable and lightweight for daily use (safer and more durable than those with plastic heads) and not cause hand fatigue. Black satin finish keeps your dispenser looking pristine for years to come. INCLUDED THREE DECORATING TIPS give your pies, cakes, waffles and hot/cold beverages a memorable, professional presentation. Your homemade desserts/savory dishes will look as beautiful as they taste.

EASY-CARE DESIGN allows you to simply rinse out the container and use the included cleaning brush to clean the intricate decorating tips and dispenser head. Store all your accessories and SPARE N2O HOLDER AND SILICONE SEAL in the INCLUDED MESH STORAGE BAG.

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS, USE TIPS AND RECIPES will have you dispensing gourmet artisanal desserts, savory toppings, and butter with NO PRESERVATIVES in just minutes. For butter: shake dispenser 25-30 times, release N2O, open dispenser, and remove with spatula. Compatible with all brands of 8-gram N2O cream chargers (NOT INCLUDED AS IT IS PROHIBITED BY AMAZON). Note: Use CO2 cartridges ONLY when using the dispenser as a soda siphon for carbonating beverages or acidic sauces, but NOT with cream.

RISK-FREE PURCHASE: Easy Returns, Quick Refunds and a Warranty to ensure your ongoing satisfaction with your whip cream dispenser. If your EurKitchen Whipped Cream Dispenser does not perform to your expectations, return it for a 100% refund of your purchase price or contact us at Rohego for an immediate and expedited replacement. Our customer’s satisfaction is our #1 priority!
